name: money-printer-server
description: Command runner for the Money Printer server project

scripts.test: docker exec --tty $(docker compose ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "MP_ENVIRONMENT=test PYTHONPATH=src pytest --workers 1 --tests-per-worker 1 --cov-config=.coveragerc --cov=src --cov-report term:skip-covered src/"
scripts.test:focus: docker exec --tty $(docker compose ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "MP_ENVIRONMENT=test PYTHONPATH=src pytest -m focus --workers 1 --tests-per-worker 1 --cov-config=.coveragerc --cov=src --cov-report term:skip-covered src/"
scripts.db:migrate: docker exec --tty $(docker compose ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=development alembic revision --autogenerate -m "$npm_config_name"
scripts.db:update: docker exec --tty $(docker compose ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=development alembic upgrade head"

author: Tim Gittos
